Greetings, Kerbals and Kerbettes!

I am happy to announce the release of AMRSD's first SSTO!

![PTWSkEn.png](http://i.imgur.com/PTWSkEn.png)

Launch album:

> [Javascript is disabled. View full album](//imgur.com/a/3EfQA)

Render by esinohio:

![oQ7cFBV.png](http://i.imgur.com/oQ7cFBV.png)

To fly:

After you lift off, point as high as you can until you begin lose speed, then point farther down, and repeat until you go to rockets.

Continue to orbit on rockets.

When you are ready to reenter, deorbit, deploy the flaps (AG1) and the airbrakes, and point 20 or so degrees above prograde.

As you renenter, it will get harder to keep the nose up, just keep it as high as possible.

When it is almost facing prograde, begin to turn it.

Landing is easy, just make sure you have enough speed to keep your vertical velocity up.

Enjoy!

[Download](http://kerbalx.com/Mad_Rocket_Scientist/Zypher)
